Detailed Description

(blackadder Core) The LocalHost class represents a local software entity that accesses Blackadder's world using the provided service model.

Such entity can be a user-space application (or a kernel module) as well as other Click Elements (for instance the rendezvous element).

Parameters:
type the type of the software entity. LOCAL_PROCESS for an application or a kernel module, CLICK_MODULE for a click element.
id a local identifier of the software entity. It can be the netlink port at which an application or a kerbel module expects data, or the out Click port to the Click Element.
Returns:
